Name: Manky Panky
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Red berries, red wine, and ruby orange are subtly fortified with gin and the underlying herbal notes of fernet liqueur.
History: Created 5th February 2014 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England. A fruity riff on Ada 'Coley' Coleman 's classic Hanky-Panky .
Nutrition: One serving of Manky Panky contains 190 calories
